title: Hungry Buddha
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Pizza, Italian, Beer/Wine, Take-out
description: Small vegetarian bistro shaped as a sushi-vegetarian-bar, with 8 seats. Opened Feb 2013 by an Italian chef who makes cheese and sourdough for bread and pizza. Offers choice of organic imported wines. Also sells local TCMs, organic teas from Yunnan province, and local products like dry mushroom and fermented tofu. Located just off the main square in Old Town Shaxi near the gate that goes down towards to river.
